greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - log(1 + x)^k).
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Stirling Transform
mathematica: nmax = 21; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1 - Log[1 + x]^k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
nmax = 21; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[Sum[DivisorSigma[1, k] Log[1 + x]^k/k, {k, 1, nmax}]], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jun 17 2018
